title: Frida Kahlo Sells for $34.9 Million, Smashing Record for a Latin-American Artwork
sub_head: The 1949 self-portrait, ‘Diego y yo,’ breaks the mark set by a work by her husband, Diego Rivera
body:
A self-portrait by Mexican artist Frida Kahlo sold for $34.9 million at Sotheby’s on Tuesday, an auction record for any Latin American artist.
The 1949 painting, “Diego y yo,” hints at the tumult of her marriage to artist Diego Rivera in part because she added a tiny portrait of his face atop her forehead.
